title: Between the Scenes - Anna Kendrick on Making a Thing with Trevor and Outraging the Sneaker Community
itunes:title: Between the Scenes - Anna Kendrick on Making a Thing with Trevor and Outraging the Sneaker Community
description:
Anna Kendrick chats about the legacy of her previous Between the Scenes appearance and the online outrage that ensued when she posted an image of her creased sneaker.
